mapper.select: SELECT statusTab.serverId ,serverTab.serverName, serverTab.envType, serverTab.serialNumber, serverTab.insideIp, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM keybox_login_status AS statusTab INNER JOIN oc_server AS serverTab ON statusTab.serverId = serverTab.id GROUP BY serverId ORDER BY cnt DESC, serverTab.serverName, serverTab.envType DESC, serverTab.serialNumber limit 10
SELECT username,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM keybox_login_status GROUP BY username ORDER BY cnt DESC limit 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM cmdb_user WHERE authed = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM keybox_login_status;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(gmtCreate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dateCat, sum(case when loginType=0 then 1 else 0 end) as keyboxCnt, sum(case when loginType=1 then 1 else 0 end) as getwayCnt FROM keybox_login_status WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{cnt} DAY) <= date(gmtCreate) GROUP BY dateCat
